mapper.sql: BRD_SQ , MBR_SQ , BRD_TTL , BRD_CONT , BRD_DEL_YN , BRD_RECMMND_CNT , BRD_VW_CNT , BRD_SLT_YN , BRD_SLT_CMMT_SQ , BRD_DIV_CD , BRD_DTL_DIV_CD , BRD_NOTI_DIV_CD , BRD_SLT_DIV_CD , BRD_REGIST_DTM
mapper.select:
( SELECT
FROM tbl_board_m WHERE BRD_NOTI_DIV_CD = 'Y' ORDER BY BRD_REGIST_DTM DESC LIMIT 4 ) UNION
( SELECT
FROM tbl_board_m
ORDER BY CASE #{sorting} WHEN "1" THEN BRD_REGIST_DTM WHEN "2" THEN BRD_VW_CNT WHEN "3" THEN BRD_RECMMND_CNT END DESC
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset} )
